sku.Description: The policy sku. This property is optional, obsolete, and will be ignored.

location.Description: The location of the policy assignment. Only required when utilizing managed identity.

identity.Description: The managed identity associated with the policy assignment.

displayName.Description: The display name of the policy assignment.

policyDefinitionId.Description: The ID of the policy definition or policy set definition being assigned.

scope.Description: The scope for the policy assignment.

parameters.Description: Required if a parameter is used in policy rule.

description.Description: This message will be part of response in case of policy violation.

name.Description: The name of the policy sku. Possible values are A0 and A1.

tier.Description: The policy sku tier. Possible values are Free and Standard.

principalId.Description: The principal ID of the resource identity.

tenantId.Description: The tenant ID of the resource identity.

policyType.Description: The type of policy definition. Possible values are NotSpecified, BuiltIn, and Custom.

mode.Description: The policy definition mode. Possible values are NotSpecified, Indexed, and All.

displayName.Description: The display name of the policy definition.

parameters.Description: Required if a parameter is used in policy rule.

policyType.Description: The type of policy definition. Possible values are NotSpecified, BuiltIn, and Custom.

displayName.Description: The display name of the policy set definition.

parameters.Description: The policy set definition parameters that can be used in policy definition references.

policyDefinitions.Description: An array of policy definition references.

policyDefinitionId.Description: The ID of the policy definition or policy set definition.

parameters.Description: Required if a parameter is used in policy rule.
